dict.string: Increases the critical chance of spells by 10%
Reduces Cast Times and Cooldowns by 10%.
Your spells reduce the target's damage taken by 25% decreasing to 0% over 5 seconds.
Your healing shields the target for 10% of the healing done.
Your spells cast 5% faster and fire a bolt of light at an enemy target dealing 1000 damage.
Increases critical chance by 5% and 50% of Overhealing is distributed to injured allies.
Healing done is increased by 10% and your damage taken is reduced by 10%.
Your spells increase the maximum health and damage done of the target by 10% for 1 minute.
Your spells create a spark of life causing the target to be healed for 50 the next time they take damage.
Your spells have a 10% chance to grant 400 shielding to the lowest health ally.
Each second you grant 3 shielding to all allies.
Once every 30 seconds if an ally would die instead you instantly heal them for 300 and make them immune for 2.5 seconds.
All healing done has a 3% chance to summon an Avatar that heals allies for 15 seconds.
